thread.title: Sunmbo
thread.title_full: Bake Me A Wish! reviewed by Sunmbo

author: Sunmbo
title: Sunmbo
text: A friend introduced me to bake me a wish. I live in Nigeria and needed to buy a cake for my family in the U.S. I had ordered for a red velvet cake but cheese cake was delivered. Apparently, this was a mix up from the shipping department. I was furious. I called customer care and it was the sweetest lady ever, she apologised for the mix up and immediately ordered the velvet cake. The velvet cake was delivered the following day. My family was happy, they got to eat 2 cakes!
